description: The least complex of the three MPEG-4_AVC profiles, constrained in several ways, including a limit to intra (I) and predicted (P) slice types.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">mp4</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects (formal name); MPEG-4, Advanced Video Coding (part 10), Baseline Profile
